name: STAYNEX
description: Staynex aims to revolutionize the travel and hospitality industry by integrating cutting-edge Web3 innovation with real-world expertise to create a seamless, membership subscription, commission-free, and user-centric travel experience. Our vision is to democratize travel, ensuring fair pricing for travelers while maximizing profitability for hotels and resorts. By leveraging blockchain technology, AI, and decentralized finance (DeFi) protocols, Staynex seeks to offer unparalleled value, exclusive experiences, and genuine savings on bookings.
